casebody.data:
Peter DALEDDA, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Loretta GUARDINO, Defendant-Respondent. C-560 September Term 2017
080039 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 2, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003215-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
